creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: three men relaxing in the shade at L: one is seated on a carved bench holding a staff; another is seated on the ground, and one is reclining on stomach, resting head in hand; ruins at R
